text:
Hi, I‚Äôm Yunyi, a ScM student at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.
I am currently doing virology research at the Pekosz lab and also work as a research assistant at the R3ISE center. For more information, please visit my profile page.
Looking forward to sharing some useful information with you here! üêæ
